text: Hey? I used to be in this school, Although the food were honestly mid, The teachers were great during my 6 years here. I learnt a lot of stuff. I never really enjoyed science in this school, But in secondary, FOR SOME REASON. I enjoy science and english.

I was a student in this school before, and made some friends during that whole 6 years in that school. The teachers were awesome and I also liked that all of the students there were friendly.

PSLE was hard but i managed to just pass. Now I'm in secondary.

Hi, I'm from Class of 2024 and I had a great time in CPS. I'll remember Mr Zaki, a great Science teacher and the stories that he shared( If you're in his class, please watch his videos ;) ). I think they're gonna add another facility next year so watch out for that. They have wellness Wednesdays to help stretch and share gratitude. That's all i have. Hope you join our school :) !!

graduated happily from this school and my teachers ( ms hong and mdm tan ) were amazing teachers and will definitely visit this school again. students here are definitely trouble makers in some classes but my class was on the good side:) food is pretty good and not too expensive

not all students are kind because I get bullied sometimes but I made good friends there and the teachers are super kind except one teacher that Litrelly did not let me see the dentist when my molar tooth was dropping also CCAs there are really fun and I had good teachers in my 6 years I will miss this school the school leaders are also very caring. -Alexander Class of 2024
